get.description:
Get the Message Toxicity from HuggingFace Roberta model.

Args:
    msg (str): the message that we want to analyze.
    api_client (ApiClient, optional): authentification of the user of the request.
        Defaults to Depends(deps.get_trusted_api_client).

Returns:
    ToxicityClassification: the score of toxicity of the message.

AssistantReplyTask.title: AssistantReplyTask
AssistantReplyTask.description: A task to prompt the user to act as the assistant.

Conversation.title: Conversation
Conversation.description: Represents a conversation between the prompter and the assistant.

ConversationMessage.title: ConversationMessage
ConversationMessage.description: Represents a message in a conversation between the user and the assistant.

InitialPromptTask.title: InitialPromptTask
InitialPromptTask.description: A task to prompt the user to submit an initial prompt to the assistant.

LabelAssistantReplyTask.title: LabelAssistantReplyTask
LabelAssistantReplyTask.description: A task to label an assistant reply to a conversation.

LabelConversationReplyTask.title: LabelConversationReplyTask
LabelConversationReplyTask.description: A task to label a reply to a conversation.

LabelInitialPromptTask.title: LabelInitialPromptTask
LabelInitialPromptTask.description: A task to label an initial prompt.

LabelPrompterReplyTask.title: LabelPrompterReplyTask
LabelPrompterReplyTask.description: A task to label a prompter reply to a conversation.

LabelTaskDisposition.title: LabelTaskDisposition
LabelTaskDisposition.description: Reason why the task was issued.

LabelTaskMode.title: LabelTaskMode
LabelTaskMode.description: Label task mode that allows frontends to select an appropriate UI.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: Represents a message in a conversation between the user and the assistant.

MessageRanking.title: MessageRanking
MessageRanking.description: A user has given a ranking for a message.

MessageRating.title: MessageRating
MessageRating.description: A user has rated a message.

MessageTree.title: MessageTree

PrompterReplyTask.title: PrompterReplyTask
PrompterReplyTask.description: A task to prompt the user to submit a reply to the assistant.

PublicSettings.title: PublicSettings
PublicSettings.description: Subset of backend settings which can be retrieved by untrusted API clients.

RankAssistantRepliesTask.title: RankAssistantRepliesTask
RankAssistantRepliesTask.description: A task to rank a set of assistant replies to a conversation.

RankConversationRepliesTask.title: RankConversationRepliesTask
RankConversationRepliesTask.description: A task to rank a set of replies to a conversation.

RankPrompterRepliesTask.title: RankPrompterRepliesTask

ReplyToConversationTask.title: ReplyToConversationTask
ReplyToConversationTask.description: A task to prompt the user to submit a reply to a conversation.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.description:
Base class for settings, allowing values to be overridden by environment variables.

This is useful in production for secrets you do not wish to save in code, it plays nicely with docker(-compose),
Heroku and any 12 factor app design.

State.title: State
State.description: States of the Open-Assistant message tree state machine.

SummarizeStoryTask.title: SummarizeStoryTask
SummarizeStoryTask.description: A task to summarize a story.

TaskAck.title: TaskAck
TaskAck.description: The frontend acknowledges that it has received a task and created a message.

TaskClose.title: TaskClose
TaskClose.description: The frontend asks to mark task as done

TaskDone.title: TaskDone
TaskDone.description: Signals to the frontend that the task is done.

TaskNAck.title: TaskNAck
TaskNAck.description: The frontend acknowledges that it has received a task but cannot create a message.
